metadata.subject: Science
metadata.lesson_title: Things That Do Not Grow or Move

objectives.primary_objective: Understand the difference between living and non-living things - Things That Do Not Grow or Move

content_blocks.text: Today we learn about things that do not grow or move.
Living things grow, move, and need food. Non-living things do not.
Look around and name one living and one non-living thing.
Living things breathe, grow, and reproduce. Non-living things do not.
